source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_00<tab>P'yandih still seems to be having an easy time managing the guild.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_00<tab>ウルダハのペ・ヤンディは、相変わらず突っ立っているようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_01<tab>As P'yandih tells it, Martyn has caught wind of another promising candidate somewhere in the Black Shroud. She says he awaits your arrival at the Carline Canopy, urging you to hurry there before he finds himself in trouble.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_01<tab>ペ・ヤンディから、マーティンがグリダニアにいると聞いた。グリダニアのカーラインカフェ付近にいる「マーティン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_02<tab>You find Martyn serving drinks and waiting tables at the Carline Canopy, allegedly for the purpose of affording room and board, as well as picking up on local gossip. He goes on to explain that a bandit has been terrorizing any and everyone who passes through the Shroud. Such a man, both formidable and seemingly desperate for coin, would be a worthy choice to hire into the Celestium's employ. With his shift at the tavern ended, Martyn bids you follow him to Bentbranch Meadows.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_02<tab>マーティンと話したところ、カフェで呼び込みをしていた。彼は中央森林に現れる野盗を新たな敵役にしたいようで、探しに向かうことになった。中央森林のベントブランチ牧場で「マーティン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_03<tab>Martyn arrives dressed ready for battle, and he is heartened to see you are as well. Knowing the bandit was last spotted in the Jadeite Thick, he suggests splitting up to track them down faster.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_03<tab>マーティンと話し、翡翠湖畔やグリーンティア択伐地に現れる野盗を探すことになった。中央森林の翡翠湖畔にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB86201 /var>」で見渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_04<tab>You work your way through the thick of the thicket, yet try as you might, there is no sign of the bandit. Undeterred, you set out for another vantage point to continue the hunt.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB86201 /var>で見渡したが、怪しい人影はなかった。中央森林のグリーンティア択伐地にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB84701 /var>」で見渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_05<tab>At last you find the dreaded bandit of the Jadeite Thick. Much to your surprise, however, he has already been defeated by a band of blue mages. They explain that they initially came to test the limits of their magic, but are nevertheless grateful for the sizable bounty they will receive for turning in the bandit. The sizable bounty Martyn incidentally forgot to mention. Sadly, the bandit's defeat served only as proof that they were not the rival you were hoping for, and so your search must begin anew. While Martyn sets off in search of a new lead, he asks that you return to Ul'dah and report back to P'yandih.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_05<tab>野盗を見つけたが、青魔道士の冒険者パーティにすでに倒されていた。野盗には高額な懸賞金がかけられていたらしく、それがマーティンの目的だったようだ。マーティンは青魔道士の活躍を目の当たりにして満足そうだが、新たな敵役は見つからなかったので、ほかの地へ向かうようだ。冒険者はペ・ヤンディに報告を頼まれた。ミルバネス礼拝堂付近で「ペ・ヤンディ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_06<tab>P'yandih is sad to hear of what took place in the Black Shroud, but she is hopeful Martyn will have better luck elsewhere. Assuming he does manage to find a fighter worthy to be your rival, she suggests learning the spell Rehydration to supplement your already impressive arsenal of spells.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_06<tab>ペ・ヤンディに諸々報告した。青魔道士として更に強くなって、青魔法「補水」をラーニングして、ペ・ヤンディのもとへ戻ってこよう。

※青魔道士のレベルが78以上になり、青魔法「補水」をラーニングすると、ミルバネス礼拝堂付近のペ・ヤンディから次の青魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_07<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_08<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_09<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_10<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_11<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_12<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_13<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_14<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_15<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_16<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_17<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_18<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_19<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_20<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_21<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_22<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SEQ_23<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Martyn at the Carline Canopy in Gridania.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_00<tab>カーラインカフェ付近のマーティンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Martyn at Bentbranch Meadows.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_01<tab>ベントブランチ牧場のマーティンと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_02<tab>Survey the area at the designated location.
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_03<tab>Survey the designated location.
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_04<tab>Speak with P'yandih in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_04<tab>ウルダハのペ・ヤンディと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_100_000<tab>Still working to master that new blue magic, I trust? I suspect you'll have need of it when you're finally face-to-face with your nemesis.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_100_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
申し訳ないのですが、先生の伝言どおり、
青魔法「スキルトロン」をラーニングしてきてもらえませんか……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>The next blue mage quest will be available from P'yandih upon learning Schiltron.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>青魔法「スキルトロン」をラーニングすると、ペ・ヤンディから、
次の青魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_000<tab>Good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If you're here, then I take it you've finished studying that spell as Martyn asked. Good.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
青魔道士としてまたも腕を上げられたようで、
青魔法「スキルトロン」もラーニングしてきてくれたんですね！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_001<tab>And your timing couldn't be better. I've a missive from Martyn.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_001<tab>新たな<var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>探しの旅に出ている先生から、
ちょうど連絡が届いたところですよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_002<tab>He says he's found another promising candidate, this time in the Black Shroud. You're to meet with him at the Carline Canopy. I'd suggest you leave sooner rather than later, before he finds himself in trouble.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_002<tab>今度は、グリダニアへ向かったようで、
あなたに「カーラインカフェ」まで来てほしいそうです。
ご足労をおかけしますが、先生のもとへ行ってあげてください。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_010<tab>If this candidate is as strong as he says, he's like to be in over his head. I suggest making for Gridania as soon as possible.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_010<tab>先生は、グリダニアへ向かったようで、
あなたに「カーラインカフェ」まで来てほしいそうです。
ご足労をおかけしますが、先生のもとへ行ってあげてください。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_020<tab>We have tables available for anyone seeking refreshment here at the Carline Canopy. I highly recommend our freshly brewed tea, or a bowl of our famous─
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_020<tab>いらっしゃいませ～。
おいしい紅茶や、名物のシチューはいかがでしょうか～？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_021<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!?

TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_022<tab>Before you say anythin', I've a perfectly good explanation. It's Royse's fault, and all her gil-pinchin'. With what little she gave me, I could scarcely afford the trip here.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_022<tab>これには事情があってだね……
ロイスさんから支給された僅かな出張経費が、
すぐに底を尽きてしまったので、稼がねばならなかったのだよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_023<tab>Thankfully, workin' here at the Adventurers' Guild not only covered my room and board, but also gave me the chance to listen in on the latest gossip.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_023<tab>だが、冒険者ギルドを兼ねたカフェで働いたおかげで、
冒険者たちから耳寄りな情報を聞くことができた。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_024<tab>Word has it there's a notorious bandit at large, preyin' on merchants and travelers passin' through the Shroud.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_024<tab>なんでも、最近、黒衣森の中央森林に、
行商や旅人を狙う野盗が現れるらしいのだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_025<tab>They routed the Wood Wailers and no one's seen hide nor hair of the adventurers who've been foolish enough to investigate.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_025<tab>鬼哭隊が討伐に向かったが、返り討ちに遭い、
雇われた冒険者たちも、ことごとくやられてしまったという。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_026<tab>I assumed it was a veritable army, but no─it's all the work of a single bandit. Tell me that doesn't sound like a nemesis worthy of Azuro the Second?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_026<tab>驚くべきことは、野盗は単独だということ。
それだけ強いのなら、新たな<var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>として、
申し分ないと思わないか？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_A1_000_001<tab>Surely, you can't be serious?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_A1_000_001<tab>犯罪者をスカウトするのか！？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_A1_000_002<tab>You want to hire a criminal? Really?
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_027<tab>What? It's not as if they won't be made to pay for their crimes first.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_027<tab>も、もちろん、まずは罪を償ってもらってからの話だ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_028<tab>Besides, thievery usually means they want for coin, don't it? With steady pay at the Masked Carnivale, they'd have the chance to turn their life around.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_028<tab>それに、野盗になったということは、きっと金に困っているはず。
マスクカーニバルで働けば定収が入るので、
更生することも期待できるだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_029<tab>At any rate, we need to stop them before anyone else does.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_029<tab>とにもかくにも、早くその野盗を倒さないと、
ほかの者に先を越されてしまう……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_100_029<tab>That is to say, it'll all be for nothin' if they're apprehended by the Wood Wailers. And our timin' couldn't be better─my shift just ended. Meet me at Bentbranch Meadows when you're ready. We can start our search from there.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_100_029<tab>い、いや、危険な野盗は放っておけんということだ。
ちょうど、仕事も交代の時間……
まずは「ベントブランチ牧場」に向かおう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_030<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_040<tab>Dressed for battle as well, I see. Your nemesis-to-be is said to be making camp in the Jadeite Thick. We're like to find them faster if we split up.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_040<tab>いつでも戦えるよう、着替えておいたぞ。
例の野盗は「翡翠湖畔」や「グリーンティア択伐地」に、
よく出没するそうなので、その辺りを手分けして探すとしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>You see no sign of the bandit. Perhaps you will have better luck near Greentear...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>特に怪しい人影は見当たらない。
「グリーンティア択伐地」の方を探してみよう……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_060<tab>Do my eyes deceive me, or is this a band of...blue mages!?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_060<tab>大きな音がしたので、駆けつけてみたら……
君たちはまさか、青魔道士か？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_061<tab>Master Martyn? By the Twelve, what a most fortuitous meeting!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_061<tab>もしかして、マーティン先生ですか！？
こんなところでお会いするなんて奇遇ですね……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_062<tab>The four of us became fast friends at the guild, you see, and decided it best if we travel the realm together, both to fill our logs and test the limits of our blue magic.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_062<tab>僕たちは青魔道士ギルドに所属する冒険者です。
青魔道士ログのために、こうしてパーティを組んで、
各地の危険地帯に挑戦しているんですよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_063<tab>When we heard there was a notorious bandit roaming the woods, we couldn't well stay away. He was a formidable foe, to be sure, but thankfully our efforts proved enough.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_063<tab>カーラインカフェにて、野盗の噂を聞きつけたので、
思い切って討伐に向かい、なんとか倒すことができました。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_064<tab>I can certainly understand now why there was such a sizable bounty on his head. It will go a long way toward the purchase of our home in one of the adventurers' residential districts. We're thinking of settling down in <var 09 E947 ((Limsa Lominsa)) ((Gridania)) ((Ul'dah)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_064<tab>これで、彼にかけられていた高額な懸賞金が手に入ります！
仲間といっしょに冒険者居住区の土地を購入しようと、
頑張っているところなんですよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_A2_000_001<tab>Bounty!? I didn't hear anything about a bounty!
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_A2_000_002<tab>So you were only in it for the gil...

TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_065<tab>Don't give me that look. With how little Royse compensates me, how else was I to account for my expenses? That the bounty would have left me with gil to spare is just a happy coincidence.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_065<tab>しゅ、出張費が底を尽きたんだ。
まとまった金が入れば、余裕もできるだろう……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_066<tab>Hm...?
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_067<tab>Are you...? You are! Azuro the Second! Your contests at the Celestium have been an inspiration to us all!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_067<tab>あなたはもしかして……
二代目マスク・ザ・ブルーじゃないですか！？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_068<tab>Safe journeys, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I hope someday we might live up to your example.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_BLUEMAGE04775_000_068<tab>みんな、あなたを目指して青魔道士になったんですよ！
これからも、その背を追いながら励みます！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_069<tab>I never realized there were so many blue mages traipsin' about in search of spells.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_069<tab>いやはや、もはや私も把握できないくらい、
たくさんの青魔道士が各地で活躍していることを痛感したよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_070<tab><sigh> Just my luck...
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_100_070<tab>Don't tell me you're still upset about the bounty? The bandit's been brought to heel, and that's all that really matters in the end.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_100_070<tab>ま、まだ、懸賞金のことを……？
ここは、すべて結果オーライということで、
気持ちよく終わらせようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_071<tab>Unfortunately, their victory over the blackguard proves we were clearly mistaken in our choice of candidate.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_071<tab>と、ともかく、野盗はほかの青魔道士に倒されてしまった。
つまり、私より弱かったということに違いない。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_072<tab>Which means we're back where we started.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_072<tab>やれやれ、また候補を探さなければならなくなった。
私は次なる土地へ向かうとしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_073<tab>If you would go and share what we've learned with P'yandih in Ul'dah, I'll see about findin' another lead.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_MARTYN_000_073<tab>君には、ウルダハのペ・ヤンディに報告を頼みたい。
進展があるまで待っていてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_080<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Returned with good news, I hope?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_080<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、お疲れさまです！
新たな<var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>は見つかりました？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_081<tab>I see... How unfortunate.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_081<tab>なるほど、グリダニアでもダメでしたか……。
ロイスさんにも報告しておきますね。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_082<tab>Well, I will see to it Royse is apprised of the situation. Thank you again for your efforts.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_082<tab>今回も、ご協力いただき、
まことにありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_083<tab>In the event Martyn <var 1A 02 /var>does<var 1A 01 /var> find a candidate worthy to be your rival, I think it prudent you add more spells to your arsenal. As I recall, Martyn claimed Rehydration is a spell worth learning. Come and speak with me again once you've learned it.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ750_04775_PYANDIH_000_083<tab>さて、次は「補水」をラーニングしてきてください。
さらに強くなったあなたに会えることを、
楽しみにしてますよ。
